data.title: Far and Away Adventures
data.meta_description: Chengdu Sichuan, China - Far and Away Adventures
data.text:
Chengdu is in the subtropical monsoon climate zone. The four seasons of the year are characterized by early spring, hot summer, cold fall, and warm winter. The annual temperature is around 16°C, and Annual rainfall is about 1000 mm. A distinctive feature of Chengdu’s climate is cloudy and foggy, and sunshine hours are shorter, and very humid air in Chengdu. The rainy season is from July to August. However, most of the rainy times at night or partly rain, the weather won’t impact tourism to come to Chengdu. From April to October, each year is the peak season for tourism, and other times are the off-season for tourism. Chengdu may often have small earthquakes, but these earthquakes’ levels will not cause us any harm or property damage.

Last few years, Chengdu was the most popular city for Chinese tourism. Everyone knows Chengdu has so many delicious foods such as Hot pot, Sichuan cuisine, traditional food, so many kinds of street food. Some Chinese tourism attracted by the comfortable and leisurely lifestyle of Chengdu residents. Chengdu is also the city with the most beautiful women in China. Many international tourists’ primary purpose in coming to Chengdu is to see the China national treasure, which is the panda. Because Chengdu is the hometown of the panda, Chengdu is a city that embraces many cultures. Chengdu is a fashion capital. People here love to dress and fashion. Skateboarding, graffiti, and rap have been developing well; they attract different county tourists who like Street art. As the center of a city in western China, Chengdu has developed tourism industries already. In 2018, The total tourism revenue was 53 billion, the total number of visitors is 243 million, and the number of inbound tourists is 3.4 million. Most Chinese tourists stay in Chengdu for 3-5 days; one week will be the best period to remain in Chengdu. Chinese yuan as the type of currency used in the area, tourist usually cost around 200 dollars per day. There are about 2000 hotels in Chengdu, there are many chain express hotels, and there are about ten 5-star hotels. Through the WWTC report, Chengdu has become the world’s fifth fastest-growing tourism city with an annual growth rate of 11.2%; Chengdu has repeatedly become China’s best tourist city.

Chengdu city is about 5551 mi²!Chengdu is divided into seven districts. The most important way to travel in Chengdu has shared bicycles, taxis, buses, subways, and Uber. Most locals chose public transportations instead of driving because car traffic is a big problem. The shared bikes are the cheapest; you need to download through the app; it only costs you 1 yuan for one hour. You also can use 2 yuan for a public bus. The metro usually starts at 3 yuan then adds one more yuan for two more stations, but the highest cost will be 7 yuan. Uber and taxi are the most popular transportation; it depends on how far your destination; it always around 15-20 yuan for 2-10km. In recent years, public transit has covered 90% of the city through Chengdu’s development, so no matter where your destination is, you can always reach it by public transportation. The buses in Chengdu are very frequent. In general, you only need to wait 3-5 minutes to get a bus. During peak hours, there will be a bus every 1-2 minutes. The subway is the fastest transportation in Chengdu. In many cases, it will be faster than driving by yourself. From the city center to the airport, the subway will only take about 20-25 minutes.

Airbnb is still a joint decision for most travelers to stay because Airbnb’s value will be way cheaper and provide more personal space. Also, Family Hotels and Resorts are trendy when you don’t want to live close to the city, it will be far away from downtown, but it will be cheaper and quiet. I would recommend those types of accommodation, because the price is more valuable and the owner still offer as best as they can, you will be able to get more space to enjoy personal time. You always can cancel for free.

Cheng du food is very spicy and yummy. Most foods consisted of fresh ginger and garlic, chili, pepper, Sichuan pepper, and chili bean oil. It offers robust flavors. The leading food is rice, noodle, dumpling. People like to drink china, wine, beer, tea, and local people like to drink tea during the afternoon while chatting. Wine is the most popular drink for all the adults during the family reunion or friend’s appointment; this is also one of the Chinese table manners and culture. Cheng du has so many different Chinese cuisines, but the most popular is Sichuan cuisine. The most popular food is the hot pot and snacks food. Cheng du has so many other snack foods, and the flavors include spicy, sweet, sour. Mao Cai and hot pot are the most popular dishes for the local people; people like to eat Mao Cai and call mini hotpot for lunch. They want to eat hot pot as dinner. There is a street called Jing li. It is a street for the tourist, Jing li has almost all kinds of snacks, even they might not be the best, but it can make people know what Sichuan cuisine food.

Waldorf Astoria Chengdu Waldorf Astoria Chengdu is the newest luxury hotel located in the Chengdu Hi-tech area. It has 52 stories, the hotel covers classic elegance, and modern style together, and customer can feel the luxury and peace vibe.

Shangri-La Hotel, Chengdu Shangri-La Hotel is located in downtown Chengdu, and it is a wellknown international hotel in Chengdu. The building style is cover grandeur and legendary. They offer the best server experience for all their customers.

Intercontinental Century City Chengdu Intercontinental Century City Chengdu is a landmark building. It is all the guest’s dream place to stay. Also, it is close to the airport and exhibition Centre. It is surrounded by Metro.

Hilton Garden Inn Chengdu Huayang Located in Chengdu’s new CBD area, Hilton Garden Inn Chengdu Hua yang is the first Hilton brand hotel in Chengdu the provincial capital of Sichuan province, and a hub of international transportation. Here we offer spacious and well-appointed rooms.

Yun Long Hotel Yun Long Hotel is ideally located in Chengdu. They provide clean and big guest rooms with luxurious facilities to make customers live more comfortably.

Holiday Inn Chengdu West Century City Located in southern Chengdu, it has a New International exhibition, and a convention center surrounded the whole hotel. The hotel can provide 28 meeting rooms ranging from 58m2-2800m2 accommodating 12-2800 guests.

Crowne Plaza Chengdu City Center The Crowne Plaza Chengdu is located in the middle of the CBD area, across the street, are the famous shopping street and dining area called ” Chun Xi Lu.” You can take the metro to everywhere around the city, and it provides the most convenient transportation.

Somerset Riverview, Chengdu It has the best location, and it is close to the Jinjiang River. It is the best place in Chengdu where living and working together also provide so many meeting spaces.

Four Points by Sheraton Chengdu, Pujiang Resort The Four Points by Sheraton Chengdu, Pujiang Resort sits next to a golf course in the county’s Grande Valley Resort. Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport (CTU) is approximately one hour away. The hotel offers 276 guestrooms.

Ascott Raffles City Chengdu Ascott Raffles City Chengdu has the best position were close to the most bustling business center; it also close to Renmin Nan Road. The hotel has 298 luxurious rooms from studio to 4-bedroom penthouse,

Frist: Ascott Raffles city Chengdu Is my favorite place because the location and building are really fancy, is located in the CBD area, you can go wherever you want.

Second: Four Points by Sheraton Sheraton Chengdu Pujiang resort, this is kind of far away to CBD area, but It can provide different feeling and views about Chengdu, here has no high building, so you can be able to know what kind of people’s life will be if they live in the countryside, and here has so many tea facilities, so you can be able to visit.

Third: Waldorf Astoria Chengdu is the most luxurious place, so you can give all the best experience for all the people who are going to attend the meeting.

It is time to adventure the nature side of Chengdu, drive 1 hour, and you can arrive at the mountain where around Chengdu; you can have a hike with your family and watch the sunrise. And you also get the chance to know Taoism and Buddhism.

Morning: E Mei mountain

E Mei mountain is One of the four prettiest Buddhist mountains in China, is also the best place to watch the sunrise; you can stay overnight in the mountain, so you can bring your family to hike to the golden top see the sunrise. The Golden Top is the most attractive place for people to climb from midnight. You can see the largest gold Buddha at the Golden Top, also Golden Top as the six wonders spot to view the sunrise, and cloud sea, Buddha’s light.

Chengdu is one of the most popular cities to visit. Chengdu attracts different tourists from all over the world with its good urban planning and cultural diversity. You can eat a lot of delicious food here, and you can also understand and feel the laid-back Chinese lifestyle here. Chengdu is a transportation hub in western China. You can take airplanes, express trains, trains, buses, and cars to many beautiful and spectacular natural attractions around. Although Chengdu has many shortcomings, it needs every tourist’s advice and helps to make Chengdu a better tourist city. Convenient transportation can also help you who can’t drive to go wherever you want to go. The overall cost and consumption of traveling here will not be too high, so Chengdu has become a cost-effective tourist city. Chengdu will provide you with an unforgettable travel experience. In the end, Chengdu is a city you don’t want to leave when you come.
